articles.author: Hattie Hayes
articles.title: Predicting childhood myopia and applying prevention measures - Ophthalmology Times Europe
articles.description: Identifying pre-myopia creates an opportunity to deploy accessible prevention strategies, which could reduce prevalence of myopia in children.
articles.content: Variation in prevalence rates indicates a causative relationship between lifestyle and childhood myopia. An understanding of these factors presents opportunities for interventions, or 'myopia control… [+3725 chars]
